channel.title: A good pK server
channel.description:
like my title is saying, im searching for a good, very easy to train PK server!
Just to use for fun with my brothers :p :)
can you give me a name or a link from a source you know its a good pk server, thanks ..

item.title: A good pK server
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Lol Jordie just noticed your sig lmfao.
I think it applies to me 90% of the time

Anyway, back on topic.
Just make teleports to loads of random little pk spots around the world, from confined places like huts to giant places like the ruins of Menaphos. I personally like the Menaphos ruins on an AS source, since it neighbours ::train. This means that you don’t have to spend 2 minutes adding a safezone. You can just plonk in a bank booth and go.
I also like it because you can hide, and you can hunt. Kind of reminds me of fist of guthix, without the orbs, huts, minigame runes and charges… And the fist of guthix.

I’m currently working on a makeshift server which I will use to hold PK tournaments on McCowanScape, as PKbox, purepk, secretsky and PK just aren’t enough.

I’ve started rambling to myself, I need to stop now before I start contemplating eating my sister’s lamb and drinking her Irn Bru.

Read full topic

item.title: A good pK server
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Retard Monkey, post:2, topic:231616”]Well, why not create a new one based on another?
Maybe take an AS source and add individual commands which instantly level a specific stat to 99?
Or make ::master available to all?

I probably don’t understand you, but I am imagining you are looking for a server which is 1-99 in seconds, and you can spend all your time PKing withought having to do long cumbersome things like making cash.

Virtual £5 says I am wrong.

~Retard Monkey[/quote]
I did that in my old rubbish Jordiescape sources lulz, and a lot of people liked it, but the kinda people that like ‘economy’ don’t like them kind of servers.

Virtual £50 says I’m wrong =D.

Read full topic

item.title: A good pK server
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

Yeah. Just make the ::master command for all ppls or make xp rate to 14000000 and make an ::cash command so they don’t need to skill
